Body: i have a Vodafone smart 2 mobile, was working perfectly fine till i followed a video on youtube on how to root it, was a disaster phone bricked , had to format and search for anything to revive it again found only italian firmware dont support arabic, i cant find the stock firmware again, and cant at least find away to make the phone read arabic. i need the original arabic firmware or a firmware that support arabic.current android is 2.3.7
Title: cant find stock firmware for vodafone smart 2 egypt/ middleeast that support arabic

history.Text: i have a Vodafone smart 2 mobile, was working perfectly fine till i followed a video on youtube on how to root it, was a disaster phone bricked , had to format and search for anything to revive it again found only italian firmware dont support arabic, i cant find the stock firmware again, and cant at least find away to make the phone read arabic. i need the original arabic firmware or a firmware that support arabic.current android is 2.3.7
cant find stock firmware for vodafone smart 2 egypt/ middleeast that support arabic
